class="row"><div class="col docItemCol_pMIZ"><div class="docItemContainer_AbX8"><article><nav class="theme-doc-breadcrumbs breadcrumbsContainer_WOxe" aria-label="Breadcrumbs"><ul class="breadcrumbs" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/BreadcrumbList"><li class="breadcrumbs__item"><a aria-label="Home page" class="breadcrumbs__link" href="/"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="breadcrumbHomeIcon_BK2s"><path d="M10 19v-5h4v5c0 .55.45 1 1 1h3c.55 0 1-.45 1-1v-7h1.7c.46 0 .68-.57.33-.87L12.67 3.6c-.38-.34-.96-.34-1.34 0l-8.36 7.53c-.34.3-.13.87.33.87H5v7c0 .55.45 1 1 1h3c.55 0 1-.45 1-1z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></a></li><li class="breadcrumbs__item"><span class="breadcrumbs__link">Migrating from 1.x / npm</span><meta itemprop="position" content="1"></li><li itemscope="" itemprop="itemListElement" itemtype="https://schema.org/ListItem" class="breadcrumbs__item breadcrumbs__item--active"><span class="breadcrumbs__link" itemprop="name">Step-by-step</span><meta itemprop="position" content="2"></li></ul></nav><div class="tocCollapsible_O2yQ theme-doc-toc-mobile tocMobile_V641"><button type="button" class="clean-btn tocCollapsibleButton_FeZs">On this page</button></div><div class="theme-doc-markdown markdown"><header><h1>Step-by-step</h1></header><div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-tip admonition_pG2x alert alert--success"><div class="admonitionHeading_REqR"><span class="admonitionIcon_K3KH"><svg viewBox="0 0 12 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.5 0C3.48 0 1 2.19 1 5c0 .92.55 2.25 1 3 1.34 2.25 1.78 2.78 2 4v1h5v-1c.22-1.22.66-1.75 2-4 .45-.75 1-2.08 1-3 0-2.81-2.48-5-5.5-5zm3.64 7.48c-.25.44-.47.8-.67 1.11-.86 1.41-1.25 2.06-1.45 3.23-.02.05-.02.11-.02.17H5c0-.06 0-.13-.02-.17-.2-1.17-.59-1.83-1.45-3.23-.2-.31-.42-.67-.67-1.11C2.44 6.78 2 5.65 2 5c0-2.2 2.02-4 4.5-4 1.22 0 2.36.42 3.22 1.19C10.55 2.94 11 3.94 11 5c0 .66-.44 1.78-.86 2.48zM4 14h5c-.23 1.14-1.3 2-2.5 2s-2.27-.86-2.5-2z"></path></svg></span>tip</div><div class="admonitionContent_ws_v"><p>You may have heard about <a href="/features/pnp">Yarn Plug&#x27;n&#x27;Play</a> and be worried that your project isn&#x27;t compatible yet. <strong>Don&#x27;t worry!</strong></p><p><strong>This migration will let you keep your <code>node_modules</code> folder</strong>. It&#x27;s only once we&#x27;re done that you&#x27;ll have to decide whether you want to spend time migrating to Yarn PnP. Whether you do it or stay on <code>node_modules</code>, migrating to Yarn Modern will have <a href="/migration/overview">many benefits</a>.</p></div></div>
<div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-info admonition_pG2x alert alert--info"><div class="admonitionHeading_REqR"><span class="admonitionIcon_K3KH"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7 2.3c3.14 0 5.7 2.56 5.7 5.7s-2.56 5.7-5.7 5.7A5.71 5.71 0 0 1 1.3 8c0-3.14 2.56-5.7 5.7-5.7zM7 1C3.14 1 0 4.14 0 8s3.14 7 7 7 7-3.14 7-7-3.14-7-7-7zm1 3H6v5h2V4zm0 6H6v2h2v-2z"></path></svg></span>info</div><div class="admonitionContent_ws_v"><p>Note that those commands only need to be run once for the whole project and will automatically take effect for all your contributors as soon as they pull the branch, as long as they have <a href="https://nodejs.org/api/corepack.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Corepack</a> enabled.</p></div></div>
<h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="migration-steps">Migration steps<a href="#migration-steps" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Migration steps" title="Direct link to Migration steps">​</a></h2>
<ol>
<li>Make sure you&#x27;re using Node 18+</li>
<li>Run <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">corepack</span> <span class="path_tCL7"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">enable</span></span></code></span> to activate <a href="https://nodejs.org/api/corepack.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Corepack</a></li>
<li>Go into your project directory</li>
<li>Run <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Lock the yarn version used by the project
" href="/cli/set/version"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">set</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">version</span></a> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">berry</span></code></span></li>
<li>Convert your <code>.npmrc</code> and <code>.yarnrc</code> files into <a href="/configuration/yarnrc"><code>.yarnrc.yml</code></a> (details <a href="/migration/guide#update-your-configuration-to-the-new-settings">here</a>)</li>
<li>Run <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Install the project dependencies
" href="/cli/install"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">install</span></a></code></span> to migrate the lockfile</li>
<li>Commit all changes</li>
</ol>
<p>Good, you should now have a working Yarn install! Some things might still require some adjustments in your CI scripts (for example the deprecation of <a href="/advanced/lifecycle-scripts">arbitrary <code>pre/post</code>-scripts</a>, or the renaming of <code>--frozen-lockfile</code> into <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">--</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Abort with an error exit code if the lockfile was to be modified">immutable</span><a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Install the project dependencies
" href="/cli/install"></a></code></span>), but at least we have a working project.</p>
<h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="breaking-changes">Breaking changes<a href="#breaking-changes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Breaking changes" title="Direct link to Breaking changes">​</a></h2>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="update-your-configuration-to-the-new-settings">Update your configuration to the new settings<a href="#update-your-configuration-to-the-new-settings" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Update your configuration to the new settings" title="Direct link to Update your configuration to the new settings">​</a></h3>
<p>Modern uses a different style of configuration files than Classic. While mostly invisible for the lockfile (because we convert them on the fly), it might cause issues if you rely on <code>.npmrc</code> or <code>.yarnrc</code> files.</p>
<ul>
<li>Yarn Modern now uses <code>.yarnrc.yml</code>. Any other file is now ignored - this includes <code>.npmrc</code>.</li>
<li>As evidenced by the new file extension, the Yarnrc files are now to be written in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YAML" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">YAML</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>Most configuration keys have also been renamed to be more consistent. The comprehensive list of available settings can be found on the <a href="/configuration/yarnrc"><code>.yarnrc.yml</code> dedicated documentation</a>, but here are some important ones:</p>
<ul>
<li>Custom registries are now configured via <a href="/configuration/yarnrc#npmRegistryServer"><code data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Define the registry to use when fetching packages."><span class="key_FEvO">npmRegistryServer</span></code></a>.</li>
<li>Registry authentication tokens are now configured via <a href="/configuration/yarnrc#npmAuthToken"><code data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Define the authentication token to use by default when accessing your registries."><span class="key_FEvO">npmAuthToken</span></code></a>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="explicitly-call-the-pre-and-post-scripts">Explicitly call the <code>pre</code> and <code>post</code> scripts<a href="#explicitly-call-the-pre-and-post-scripts" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to explicitly-call-the-pre-and-post-scripts" title="Direct link to explicitly-call-the-pre-and-post-scripts">​</a></h3>
<p>Some changes were made to how <a href="/advanced/lifecycle-scripts">lifecycle scripts</a> work in order to clarify their purpose and remove confusing behaviors. One such change is that custom <code>pre</code> and <code>post</code> scripts are no longer supported. As a result, rewrite:</p>
<div class="language-json codeBlockContainer_THO8 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_mCRr"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-json codeBlock_A5B7 thin-scrollbar" style="color:#393A34;background-color:#f6f8fa"><code class="codeBlockLines_WwWG"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;scripts&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;prestart&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;do-something&quot;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;start&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;http-server&quot;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_T13S"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_t2S_" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_d4NV"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_jF9Q"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div>
<p>Into:</p>
<div class="language-json codeBlockContainer_THO8 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_mCRr"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-json codeBlock_A5B7 thin-scrollbar" style="color:#393A34;background-color:#f6f8fa"><code class="codeBlockLines_WwWG"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;scripts&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">{</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;prestart&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;do-something&quot;</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">,</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">    </span><span class="token property" style="color:#36acaa">&quot;start&quot;</span><span class="token operator" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> </span><span class="token string" style="color:#e3116c">&quot;yarn prestart &amp;&amp; http-server&quot;</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain">  </span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><span class="token plain"></span><br></span><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token plain"></span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">}</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_T13S"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_t2S_" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_d4NV"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_jF9Q"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div>
<div class="theme-admonition theme-admonition-note admonition_pG2x alert alert--secondary"><div class="admonitionHeading_REqR"><span class="admonitionIcon_K3KH"><svg viewBox="0 0 14 16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M6.3 5.69a.942.942 0 0 1-.28-.7c0-.28.09-.52.28-.7.19-.18.42-.28.7-.28.28 0 .52.09.7.28.18.19.28.42.28.7 0 .28-.09.52-.28.7a1 1 0 0 1-.7.3c-.28 0-.52-.11-.7-.3zM8 7.99c-.02-.25-.11-.48-.31-.69-.2-.19-.42-.3-.69-.31H6c-.27.02-.48.13-.69.31-.2.2-.3.44-.31.69h1v3c.02.27.11.5.31.69.2.2.42.31.69.31h1c.27 0 .48-.11.69-.31.2-.19.3-.42.31-.69H8V7.98v.01zM7 2.3c-3.14 0-5.7 2.54-5.7 5.68 0 3.14 2.56 5.7 5.7 5.7s5.7-2.55 5.7-5.7c0-3.15-2.56-5.69-5.7-5.69v.01zM7 .98c3.86 0 7 3.14 7 7s-3.14 7-7 7-7-3.12-7-7 3.14-7 7-7z"></path></svg></span>note</div><div class="admonitionContent_ws_v"><p>This only applies to user scripts, such as <code>start</code> &amp; friends. It&#x27;s still fine to use any of <code>preinstall</code>, <code>install</code>, and <code>postinstall</code>. Consult the <a href="/advanced/lifecycle-scripts">script documentation</a> for more information.</p></div></div>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="use-yarn-dlx-instead-of-yarn-global">Use <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Run a package in a temporary environment
" href="/cli/dlx"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">dlx</span></a></code></span> instead of <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">global</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span><a href="#use-yarn-dlx-instead-of-yarn-global" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to use-yarn-dlx-instead-of-yarn-global" title="Direct link to use-yarn-dlx-instead-of-yarn-global">​</a></h3>
<p>Yarn focuses on <em>project management</em>, and managing system-wide packages was deemed to be outside of our scope. As a result, <a href="https://github.com/yarnpkg/berry/issues/821" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">global</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span> got removed</a> and needs to be replaced by <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Run a package in a temporary environment
" href="/cli/dlx"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">dlx</span></a></code></span> to run one off scripts.</p>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="dont-use-bundledependencies">Don&#x27;t use <code>bundleDependencies</code><a href="#dont-use-bundledependencies" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to dont-use-bundledependencies" title="Direct link to dont-use-bundledependencies">​</a></h3>
<p>The <code>bundleDependencies</code> field (or <code>bundledDependencies</code>) is an artifact of the past that used to let you define a set of packages that would be stored as-is within the package archive, <code>node_modules</code> and all. This feature has many problems:</p>
<ul>
<li>It uses <code>node_modules</code>, which doesn&#x27;t exist under Plug&#x27;n&#x27;Play installs.</li>
<li>It encodes the hoisting inside the package, messing with the hoisting from other packages.</li>
</ul>
<p>So how to replace them? There are different ways:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>If you need to patch a package, just fork it or reference it through the <a href="/protocol/file"><code>file:</code> protocol</a> (it&#x27;s perfectly fine even for transitive dependencies to use this protocol). The <a href="/protocol/portal"><code>portal:</code></a> and <a href="/protocol/patch"><code>patch:</code></a> protocols are also options, although they&#x27;ll only work for Yarn consumers.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>If you need to ship a package to your customers as a standalone (no dependencies), bundle it yourself using Esbuild, Webpack, Rollup, or similar tools.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="replace-nohoist-by-nmhoistinglimits">Replace <code>nohoist</code> by <code data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Highest point where packages can be hoisted."><a class="key_FEvO" href="/configuration/yarnrc#nmHoistingLimits">nmHoistingLimits</a></code><a href="#replace-nohoist-by-nmhoistinglimits" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to replace-nohoist-by-nmhoistinglimits" title="Direct link to replace-nohoist-by-nmhoistinglimits">​</a></h3>
<p>The <code>nohoist</code> setting from Yarn Classic was built for React Native in order to support workspaces, but the way it worked (through glob patterns) was causing a lot of bugs and confusion, no one being really sure which patterns needed to be set. As a result, we&#x27;ve simplified this feature in order to only support three identified patterns.</p>
<p>If you were using <code>nohoist</code>, we recommend you remove it from your manifest configuration and instead set <a href="/configuration/yarnrc#nmHoistingLimits"><code data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Highest point where packages can be hoisted."><span class="key_FEvO">nmHoistingLimits</span></code></a> in your <code>.yarnrc.yml</code> file:</p>
<div class="language-yaml codeBlockContainer_THO8 theme-code-block" style="--prism-color:#393A34;--prism-background-color:#f6f8fa"><div class="codeBlockContent_mCRr"><pre tabindex="0" class="prism-code language-yaml codeBlock_A5B7 thin-scrollbar" style="color:#393A34;background-color:#f6f8fa"><code class="codeBlockLines_WwWG"><span class="token-line" style="color:#393A34"><span class="token key atrule" style="color:#00a4db">nmHoistingLimits</span><span class="token punctuation" style="color:#393A34">:</span><span class="token plain"> workspaces</span><br></span></code></pre><div class="buttonGroup_T13S"><button type="button" aria-label="Copy code to clipboard" title="Copy" class="clean-btn"><span class="copyButtonIcons_t2S_" aria-hidden="true"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonIcon_d4NV"><path fill="currentColor" d="M19,21H8V7H19M19,5H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,7V21A2,2 0 0,0 8,23H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,21V7A2,2 0 0,0 19,5M16,1H4A2,2 0 0,0 2,3V17H4V3H16V1Z"></path></svg><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="copyButtonSuccessIcon_jF9Q"><path fill="currentColor" d="M21,7L9,19L3.5,13.5L4.91,12.09L9,16.17L19.59,5.59L21,7Z"></path></svg></span></button></div></div></div>
<h2 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="cli-changes">CLI changes<a href="#cli-changes" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to CLI changes" title="Direct link to CLI changes">​</a></h2>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="renamed-commands">Renamed commands<a href="#renamed-commands" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Renamed commands" title="Direct link to Renamed commands">​</a></h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Yarn Classic (1.x)</th><th>Yarn Modern</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">audit</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Perform a vulnerability audit against the installed packages
" href="/cli/npm/audit"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">npm</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">audit</span></a></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="path_tCL7"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">create</span></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Run a package in a temporary environment
" href="/cli/dlx"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">dlx</span></a> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">create-NAME</span></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">global</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Run a package in a temporary environment
" href="/cli/dlx"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">dlx</span></a></code></span> (<a href="#use-yarn-dlx-instead-of-yarn-global">Read more</a>)</td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="See information related to packages
" href="/cli/info"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">info</span></a></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Show information about a package
" href="/cli/npm/info"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">npm</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">info</span></a></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">list</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="See information related to packages
" href="/cli/info"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">info</span></a> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">-</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Print versions of a package from the whole project">A</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Print information for all packages, including transitive dependencies">R</span></code></span> (<span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">--</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Format the output as an NDJSON stream">json</span><a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="See information related to packages
" href="/cli/info"></a></code></span>?)</td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">login</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Store new login info to access the npm registry
" href="/cli/npm/login"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">npm</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">login</span></a></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">logout</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Logout of the npm registry
" href="/cli/npm/logout"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">npm</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">logout</span></a></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">outdated</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Open the upgrade interface
" href="/cli/upgrade-interactive"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">upgrade-interactive</span></a></code></span> (<a href="https://github.com/yarnpkg/berry/issues/749" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Read more</a>)</td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">publish</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Publish the active workspace to the npm registry
" href="/cli/npm/publish"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">npm</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">publish</span></a></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">upgrade</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Upgrade dependencies across the project
" href="/cli/up"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">up</span></a></code></span> (note: updates all workspaces)</td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Install the project dependencies
" href="/cli/install"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">install</span></a> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">--</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option">production</span></code></span></td><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <a class="path_tCL7" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Install a single workspace and its dependencies
" href="/cli/workspaces/focus"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">workspaces</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">focus</span></a> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">--</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Install the entire project">all</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="dash">--</span><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="option" data-tooltip-id="tooltip" data-tooltip-content="Only install regular dependencies by omitting dev dependencies">production</span></code></span></td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="removed-commands">Removed commands<a href="#removed-commands" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Removed commands" title="Direct link to Removed commands">​</a></h3>
<table><thead><tr><th><div style="width:150px">Yarn Classic (1.x)</div></th><th>Notes</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">check</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>Cache integrity is now checked on regular installs - <a href="https://github.com/yarnpkg/rfcs/pull/106" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Read more</a></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">import</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>First import to Classic, then migrate to Yarn Modern</td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">licenses</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>Perfect use case for plugins - <a href="https://github.com/yarnpkg/berry/issues/1164" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Read more</a></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">versions</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>Use <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="path_tCL7"><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="path">--version</span></span></code></span> and <code>node -p process.versions</code></td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 class="anchor anchorWithStickyNavbar_bEYZ" id="not-implemented-yet">Not implemented yet<a href="#not-implemented-yet" class="hash-link" aria-label="Direct link to Not implemented yet" title="Direct link to Not implemented yet">​</a></h3>
<p>Those features simply haven&#x27;t been implemented yet. Help welcome!</p>
<table><thead><tr><th><div style="width:150px">Yarn Classic (1.x)</div></th><th>Notes</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">owner</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>Will eventually be available as <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><div class="comment_nCoG">yarn npm owner</div></code></span></td></tr><tr><td><span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="binary">yarn</span> <span class="token_Ye2a" data-type="positional">team</span><span class="path_tCL7"></span></code></span></td><td>Will eventually be available as <span class="inline_hdsZ"><code><div class="comment_nCoG">yarn npm team</div></code></span></td></tr></tbody></table></div><footer class="theme-doc-footer docusaurus-mt-lg"><div class="row margin-top--sm
